        public void onPageScrolled(int position,
                           float positionOffset,
                           int positionOffsetPixels)
        This method is executed when the page is scrolled/swiped in the view-pager.
        Specified by:
        onPageScrolled in interface android.support.v4.view.ViewPager.OnPageChangeListener
        Parameters:
        position - Current position of the page
        positionOffset - Offset applied to the page
        positionOffsetPixels - Offsets applied in term of pixels

      • onPageScrollStateChanged

        public void onPageScrollStateChanged(int state)
        This method is executed when the page scrol state is changed.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        See Also:

        This method is executed when a page is selected.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
